name: Karry
tagline: I want to develop a voice-control application named "karry".
body:
### Welcome to karry Github pages.
Now I am a CS graduate student of SECE(school of Electronics and Computer Engineering in PKU. My research interests include voice recognition,voice verification which applies _Pattern Recognition_ and _Machine Learning_ theory. 
I aim to develop a voice-control application which can make mobile phones, intelligent devices more close and convenient to users, especially the old people and those who have problem with using touch screen.

### Recent progress
Now I am reading papers and books about machine learning. My mentor gave me an Android development task which is related to voice verification. It is an interesting but challenging topic.All in all, I have confidence to complete it.


###Work together
Welcome you to contact me and build up "karry" together. 
I believe this word--"What hurts more, the pain of hard work,or the pain of regret." Share with you!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
